DOC.brief_title: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( rTMS ) Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder ( OCD )
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis Obsessive Compulsive Disorder , confirm Structured Clinical Interview DSMIVTR ( SCID ) . Subjects least moderate level OCD severity define YaleBrown Obsessive Compulsive Disorder Scale ( YBOCS ) score â‰¥ 20 . Individuals diagnose investigator follow condition : Bipolar Disorder ( lifetime ) , Psychotic Disorder ( lifetime ) , history substance abuse dependence within past year ( expect nicotine caffeine ) . An Axis II Personality Disorder , judgment investigator may hinder patient complete procedure require study protocol . Individuals clinically define neurological disorder include , limited : stroke , tic , space occupy brain lesion , history seizure except therapeutically induced electroconvulsive therapy ( ECT ) , history cerebrovascular accident , transient ischemic attack within two year , cerebral aneurysm , dementia , Parkinson 's Disease , Huntington Chorea , Multiple Sclerosis . Increased risk seizure reason , include prior diagnosis increase intracranial pressure ( large infarction trauma ) , history significant head trauma loss consciousness > 5 minute . History treatment rTMS therapy disorder . History treatment Deep Brain Stimulation . Cardiac pacemaker , implanted medication pump , intracardiac line , acute , unstable cardiac disease . Intracranial implant ( e.g . aneurysm clip , shunt , stimulators , cochlear implant , electrode ) metal object within near head , exclude mouth , safely remove . Current illicit drug use .
